statements: SELECT * FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE politician_id = 1;
SELECT politician_name, sentiment_score FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT politician_name, sentiment_score FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis ORDER BY politician_name DESC;
SELECT politician_name, social_media_platform FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE social_media_platform IN ('Twitter', 'Facebook');
SELECT politician_name, sentiment_score FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY politician_name DESC
SELECT * FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT politician_name, social_media_platform FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE politician_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY politician_id
SELECT politician_name, sentiment_score FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram' AND sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, social_media_platform FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis GROUP BY social_media_platform HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3
SELECT * FROM Politicians;
SELECT id, name, party FROM Politicians WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT name, party FROM Politicians WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSentiments ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sentiment, timestamp FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE politician_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name, party FROM Politicians WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT name, party FROM Politicians WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSentiments ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT politician_id, sentiment, timestamp FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT name, party, COUNT(*) FROM Politicians GROUP BY party HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Politicians;
SELECT id, name FROM Politicians WHERE party = 'Democratic';
SELECT id, sentiment, timestamp FROM SocialMediaSentiment ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT platform_name, url FROM SocialMediaPlatforms WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, party FROM Politicians WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Politicians WHERE party='Republican';
SELECT name, party FROM Politicians ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, post_id, timestamp FROM SocialMediaSentiment WHERE sentiment='Positive' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT platform_name, url FROM SocialMediaPlatforms WHERE platform_name='Twitter';
SELECT * FROM Politicians JOIN SocialMediaSentiment ON Politicians.id = SocialMediaSentiment.post_id;
SELECT * FROM politicians;
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE party='Republican';
SELECT id, platform_name, followers_count FROM social_media_platforms ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT politician_id, sentiment_type FROM sentiments WHERE sentiment_type IN ('Positive', 'Neutral');
SELECT * FROM politicians
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE party='Republican'
SELECT platform_name, followers_count FROM social_media_platforms ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT politician_id, sentiment_type FROM sentiments
SELECT * FROM politicians;
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE party='Democratic';
SELECT post_text, reactions FROM posts WHERE politician_id=1 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE comments > 10 AND reactions > 20;
SELECT platform_name FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM politicians WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY politician_id DESC;
SELECT name, party FROM politicians WHERE politician_id = 3;
SELECT post_text, reactions, comments FROM posts JOIN engagements ON posts.post_id = engagements.post_id WHERE reactions > 100 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT platform_name, sentiment_text FROM social_media_platforms JOIN sentiments ON social_media_platforms.platform_id = sentiments.sentiment_id;
SELECT politician_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY politician_id HAVING total_posts > 5;
